intro: Lonicera gongshanensis, commonly known as Gongshan honeysuckle, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Caprifoliaceae and is characterized by its distinctive yellow flowers and red berries. The plant typically grows in mountainous regions and is adapted to temperate climates. It has lance-shaped leaves and produces fragrant flowers that attract pollinators. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and ecologically significant species.
